P. Ravi Sarma, MD was on the faculty of Emory University School of Medicine from 1979-95, rising to the rank of Associate Professor of Medicine (Hematology-Oncology). He has been in private practice in Atlanta, Georgia since 1995.


    Dr. Sarma was Chairman of the Board of Directors of IACA in 1983, and editor of IACA magazine, Voice of India from 1987-1991. He served as President of the Hindu Temple of Atlanta in 2007-2008. Currently he is working with organizing relief efforts for Bhutanese Refugee Families in the Atlanta area.

IASF FOUNDER

Dr. P. Ravi Sarma
